title: AbstractFileCollection
description: The schema fragment representing file collections.

DatasetProperties.title: Dataset Properties
DatasetProperties.description: The dataset properties for a file collection.

FileCollectionPath.title: File Collection Path
FileCollectionPath.description: The mandatory path to the file collection. A FileCollectionPath should represent folder level access to a set of files.

IndexFilePath.title: Index File Path
IndexFilePath.description: An optional path to an index file.

FileSourceInfos.title: File Source Info Array
FileSourceInfos.description: Array of file collection members as FileSourceInfo.

Checksum.title: MD5 Checksum
Checksum.description: MD5 checksum of file bytes - a 32 byte hexadecimal number.
